Class com.chimu.kernel.exceptions.RuntimeWrappedException 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----java.lang.Throwable
           |
           +----java.lang.Exception
                   |
                   +----java.lang.RuntimeException
                           |
                           +----com.chimu.kernel.exceptions.RuntimeWrappedException
public class RuntimeWrappedException
extends RuntimeException
implements ThrowableWrapper
A RuntimeWrappedException is a WrappedException but is a subclass of RuntimeException, so does not have to be explicitly declared and caught.

See Also:
WrappedException
